Name: Jaxon Colt
Trait: I have no qualms about stealing from the dead.
Ideal: Danger. With every great discovery comes grave danger. The two walk hand in hand. (Any)
Bond: I have a friendly rival. Only one of us can be the best, and I aim to prove it's me.
Flaw: I have no time for friends or family. I spend every waking moment thinking about and preparing for my next expedition.
Features: ['Magical Tinkering', 'Spellcasting', 'Infuse Item', 'Artificer Specialist', 'The Right Tool for the Job', 'Ability Score Improvement', 'Artificer Specialist Feature']
Spells Known: ['Shocking Grasp', 'Green-Flame Blade', 'Sanctuary', 'Disguise Self', 'Detect Magic', 'Absorb Elements', 'Cure Wounds']
Equipment: ['Mace', 'Mace', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', 'Scale Mail', "Thieves' Tools", "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Wooden Case with a Map to a Ruin or Dungeon', 'Bullseye Lantern', "Miner's Pick", "Set of Traveler's Clothes", 'Shovel', 'Two-Person Tent', 'Trinket from a Dig Site', '25 GP']
Race Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Erik Capers
Trait: I stretch the truth for the sake of a good story.
Ideal: Mastery. I'm a predator, and the other ships on the sea are my prey. (Evil)
Bond: I'll always remember my first ship.
Flaw: I follow orders, even if I think they're wrong.
Features: ['Unarmored Defense', 'Martial Arts', 'Ki', 'Unarmored Movement', 'Dedicated Weapon (Optional)', 'Monastic Tradition', 'Deflect Missiles', 'Ki-Fueled Attack (Optional)', 'Ability Score Improvement', 'Slow Fall', 'Quickened Healing (Optional)', 'Extra Attack', 'Stunning Strike', 'Focused Aim (Optional)']
Equipment: ['Shortsword', "Dungeoneer's Pack", '10 Darts', 'Belaying Pin', '50 ft. Silk Rope', 'Lucky Charm', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Rimardo Cresthill
Trait: I exaggerate the tales of my exploits.
Ideal: Prepared. I think success depends on preparing as much as possible in advance. (Any)
Bond: I admire the elves. I help them whenever I can.
Flaw: My hatred for the Red Plumes burns so brightly that I have difficulty suppressing it around them.
Equipment: ['Shortsword', 'Shortsword', "Burglar's Pack", 'Leather Armor', 'Dagger', 'Dagger', "Thieves' Tools", 'Forgery Kit', 'Set of Common Clothes', '5 GP']

Name: Willem Seemworth
Specialty: Master of Armaments. You specialized in designing and mounting defenses for the navy. You easily recognize and determine the quality of such items.
Trait: I don't mind getting my hands dirty.
Ideal: Hope. The horizon at sea holds the greatest promise. (Any)
Bond: Much of the treasure I claim will be used to enrich my community.
Flaw: I get frustrated to the point of distraction by shoddy craftsmanship.
Features: ['Spellcasting', 'Sorcerous Origin', 'Font of Magic', 'Metamagic', 'Ability Score Improvement', 'Sorcerous Versatility (Optional)']
Equipment: ['Dart', 'Component Pouch', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Dagger', 'Dagger', "Set of Well-Loved Carpenter's Tools", 'Blank Book', '1 ounce of Ink', 'Ink Pen', "Set of Traveler's Clothes", '10 GP']

Name: Corynax Deels
Trait: I strive to obey the law. I will never again make the mistake of going against authority.
Ideal: Redemption. Everyone deserves a second chance. (Good)
Bond: The horrors of my time in Stojanow haunt my dreams, only after a day of hard work can I find sleep.
Flaw: I folded under the torture, and gave information that I promised would be kept secret. My life would be in jeopardy if others found out.
Equipment: ['Chain Mail', 'Battleaxe', 'Morningstar', 'Handaxe', 'Handaxe', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Small Knife', 'Set of Common Clothes', 'Trinket of a Previous Life', '10 GP']
